
| Actions                  | Resources | Allow  | Deny                         |
|--------------------------|-----------|--------|------------------------------|
| manager:read             | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:restart          | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:ruleset_reload   | *         | *      |                              |
| manager:update_config    | *         |        | *                            |
| manager:read_api_config  | *         |        | *                            |
